text:
TeamTablets - WorkHeld | Vienna, Austria | Front-end Developer (Web, AngularJS) | On-site - Full-time |

We are SaaS Startup in the field of industrial engineering developing a field management solution. We are looking for a web front-end developer to work on our web client.

More details (in German): http://www.tabletsolutions.at/job/web-developer-mw-3/

To apply please send us a message to jobs@tabletsolutions.at at put [HN] in the subject. You will then have an interview with one of our developers and might get a small coding task. You can always also send me a direct email if you have questions: bs[@]tabletsolutions.at.
